channel.title: Belts, Binders & Wraps – AT Surgical
channel.description: Manufacturers of Orthopedic Braces and Supports since 1975

item.title: Tranz* Forms FTM Chest Binder MkIV
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The MkIV is the most competitive option for transmasculine folx. Designed & iterated upon by an FTM during his pre-op days, this is the fourth version of the product.

We’ve replaced the previous material with a higher spandex-to-nylon ratio without sacrificing the compression of the original design. This medical grade Lycra® is softer to the touch than previous iterations for a longer wear-time.

For the best binder for your body, please make sure to follow the sizing instructions before ordering.

The post Tranz* Forms FTM Chest Binder MkIV appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Tranz* Forms FTM Chest Binder MkIV appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Adjustable Compression Legging
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Tired of finding the right fit for a compression stocking?

Look no further! Our Adjustable Compression Legging removes the difficulty of putting on a stocking with it's adjustable Velcro® system. Gradient counter-pressure offers better control, & the nylon/elastic material is washable.

The post Adjustable Compression Legging appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Adjustable Compression Legging appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Light Maternity Support Belt
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The Light Maternity Support Belt was designed to support mother and child during the first trimester. This form-fitting brace was designed to ease tension on the back by distributing the weight of the belly across the waist.

The post Light Maternity Support Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The Light Maternity Support Belt was designed to support mother and child during the first trimester. This form-fitting brace was designed to ease tension on the back by distributing the weight of the belly across the waist.

Adjustable tensions straps allow the belt to fit most sizes.

The post Light Maternity Support Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Gel Arch Wrap, One Pair
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Get relief from painful foot ailments like plantar fasciitis, heel spurs, strains and sprains. This adjustable compression brace supports the arch while in motion, reducing pain while exercising, hiking or walking. The arch brace also reduces knee, hip and back pain by maintaining proper foot alignment.

The post Gel Arch Wrap, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Comfortable, soft and breathable cloth material on the outer layer with shock-absorbing, pressure-reducing, soft gel to relieve the discomfort and pain caused by the arch under compression.

The gel with inorganic antibacterial ingredients can prevent bacterial growth and includes mineral oils and skin care ingredients for skin-moisturizing. Unique gel memory formulations fit all kinds of feet. The materials are environment-friendly and can be recycled.

The post Gel Arch Wrap, One Pair appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Cotton Gait Belt
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The AT Surgical Gait Belt / Transfer Belt is designed to be a heavy duty weight bearing belt that stays securely in place when fastened. Ensure a layer of clothing is between the patient’s skin and the belt to avoid abrasion. Keep resident as close as possible to caregiver during transfer. The proper way to apply it is to keep two fingers between the belt and the patient’s body. Tighten it until it has just enough room for your fingers. If the belt is too loose you could either have it slip upward and injure the patient’s chest (especially the female patient) or increase your risk for dropping them once the weight is put on the belt. A gait belt should never be used as a restraint or on patients with G-tubes and should be avoided with patients who have catheters.

The post Cotton Gait Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• A gait belt is a device used to transfer people from one position to another, from one thing to another or while ambulating people that have problems with balance
  • When to Use: Transferring residents who are partially dependent, have some weight-bearing capacity, and are cooperative. Transfers such as bed to chair, chair to chair, or chair to car; when repositioning residents in chairs; supporting residents during ambulation; and in some cases when guiding and controlling falls
  • The proper way to apply it is to keep two fingers between the belt and the patient’s body. Tighten it until it has just enough room for your fingers
  • Ensure a layer of clothing is between residents’ skin and the belt to avoid abrasion. Keep resident as close as possible to caregiver during transfer

The post Cotton Gait Belt appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Figure Eight Ankle Support with Velcro® Closure
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
⦁ Figure eight double wrap holds firmly - won't slip or slide

⦁ Distributes stress evenly over entire surface

item.content:encoded:

item.title: Arch Support Compression Sleeve
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
• Wear anytime - especially during sports activities - directly on the skin or over a sock
  • One Size Fits (Women's Size 6 - 11 / Men's Size 6.5 - 12)
  • Ease fallen arches, flat feet, drop foot, heel, toe, ball-of-foot or Tailor's bunion pain
  • Recommended for plantar fasciitis, plantar fascial fibromatosis (Ledderhose's disease) and heel spurs
  • Two per pack

Alleviate your foot pain and support problem arches with AT Surgical Orthotic Arch Support Sleeves. These soft, elastic bandages gently compress the midfoot to provide support and stability. Can be worn in your shoe. Go far a walk, or jog with confidence. AT Surgical Orthotic Arch Support Sleeves provides gentle, targeted compression to the arch to improve posture and make standing and walking comfortable.

The post Arch Support Compression Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded: The post Arch Support Compression Sleeve appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Wrist Support Band
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Select beige material for softer support. The black band is intended for a more firm support for those especially painful injuries. The loop makes it easier to put on the band for those with arthritis or other issues limiting your ability.

The post Wrist Support Band appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Aids in the healing of injured wrists
  • Made of power elastic for total support
  • One size fits all, ideal for work or sports
  • Easily adjusted, convenient

The post Wrist Support Band appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Athletic Injury Compression Wrap
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Provides moderate support and compression to muscles without constricting breathing or muscle growth, while neoprene fabric keeps muscles warm and pliable to reduce strain and hasten recovery. Indicated for strains, cramps, pulls, and sciatica. Great for use at work or on the athletic field.

The post Athletic Injury Compression Wrap appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
This Athletic Supporter is designed to protect, lift, support and hold the testes against the body. This prevents strain on the cords and muscles during activity, helping to eliminate discomfort, and keeps them away from injury, providing unobtrusive yet consistent support for a long day of work or for vigorous sports. For correct sizing, measure the abdomen between the hips and waist. 3 inch elastic waistband retains elasticity while minimizing curling at the top and bottom. Soft knit cotton/rayon pouch gives total support. Non-roll, tubular elastic leg straps help prevent binding, wrinkling or rolling, Mesh pouch

Features:

  • 3 inch elastic waistband
  • Soft knit cotton -rayon mesh pouch
  • Non-roll, tubular elastic straps
  • Excellent supporter
  • Wash in mild suds and rinse several times in clear water to clean
  • Roll in towel to absorb moisture and dry flat
  • Do not iron
  • Do not use dryer
  • Latex free

Specifications:

  • Item Type: Athletic Jock Supporter
  • Material: Soft knit cotton -rayon mesh pouch
  • Function: Protect, lift, support and hold the testes against the body
  • Color: White
  • Washable: Wash in mild suds and rinse several times in clear water to clean
  • Iron: Do not iron
  • Weigh: 3.75 oz
  • Dimensions: 4 x 1.25 x 9 in

    • Size

  • Size Available
  • Small, Medium, Large, XL

    • The post Athletic Injury Compression Wrap appeared first on AT Surgical.
